description:
If you are introducing a new product or launching a startup, this course is for you.

In three hours, you'll learn a process for creating and testing a profitable business model for your product. You'll learn proven techniques to make a product launch plan and get in front of potential customers to validate your product and pricing BEFORE you build it.

You'll learn from an expert how successful companies have created innovative products that maximize revenue.

You'll learn this and more:

  • How to create the ideal business model for your product
  • How to find your first customers
  • A dozen different ways ways to monetize your product
  • How to choose the best price that doesn't leave money on the table
  • How to test different pricing models on a budget

The right business model and pricing strategy makes the difference between a lackluster product with mediocre results and a product that is exciting, profitable, and successful.

This course is taught by a product development expert who has helped define, price, and launch award-winning products now generating over $500 million in annual revenue.

Business expert Jim Semick from ProductPlan shows you how to discover and launch the best business model for your product including setting a price that supports a profitable business.

You'll get real-world, first-person examples of how business models are created and how products are priced.

Take this course now and start learning today how to get your product on the right track!
title: How to Launch a Profitable Product: From Idea to Revenue
